Steam (ST): Shannon and Kanon stood guard in front of the door to the Golden Land.
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon and Kanon stood guard in front of the door to the Golden Land.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金郷の扉の前には、紗音と嘉音が門番として立っていた。
Russian (RU): Шаннон и Канон стояли на страже перед дверью в Золотую Землю.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Shannon e Kanon permaneceram de guarda em frente a porta que levava à Terra Dourada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在黃金鄉的門前，紗音和嘉音作為守門人站在那裡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在黄金乡的门前，纱音和嘉音作为守门人站在那里。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Shannon e Kanon facevano guardia davanti alla porta della Terra Dorata.

Steam (ST): They glared quietly and fearlessly at the eerie fleet of ships across the horizon.
Umineko Project (UP): They glared quietly and fearlessly at the eerie fleet of ships across the horizon.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They glared quietly and fearlessly at the eerie fleet of ships across the horizon.
PC Japanese (JP): 水平線にて取り囲む不気味な大船団に臆すことなく、静かに睨み続けている。
Russian (RU): Они спокойно и бесстрашно смотрели на жуткий флот кораблей на горизонте.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles olharam silenciosamente e destemidamente para a ominosa frota de navios que vinha além do horizonte.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他們毫不畏懼從地平線上包圍過來的恐怖大船隊，靜靜地凝視著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他们毫不畏惧从地平线上包围过来的恐怖大船队，静静地凝视着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Fissavano silenziosamente e senza paura l'inquietante flotta di navi attraverso l'orizzonte.

Steam (ST): Shannon slowly lifted her hands.
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon slowly lifted her hands.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Shannon slowly lifted her hands.
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音がゆっくりと両手を掲げる。
Russian (RU): Шаннон медленно подняла руки.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Shannon lentamente ergueu suas mãos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音慢慢張開雙手。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音慢慢张开双手。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Shannon alzò lentamente le sue mani.

Steam (ST): Kanon raised his right hand, and a red blade appeared there.
Umineko Project (UP): Kanon also raised his right hand, and a blade that trailed red appeared there.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kanon also raised his right hand, and a red blade appeared there.
PC Japanese (JP): 嘉音もゆっくりと右腕を掲げ、赤き軌跡の剣を現す。
Russian (RU): Канон тоже поднял правую руку, и там появилось красное лезвие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kanon também levantou sua mão direita, e uma lâmina traçando uma trilha vermelha apareceu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 嘉音也慢慢舉起右手，現出了紅色軌跡的劍。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 嘉音也慢慢举起右手，现出了红色轨迹的剑。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche Kanon alzò la sua mano destra, e lì vi apparve una lama rossa.

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Stop right there. I forbid you to come any closer."
Umineko Project (UP): "Stop right there. I forbid you to come any closer."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「そこで止まって下さい。それ以上の接近を拒否します。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そこで止まって下さい。それ以上の接近を拒否します」
Russian (RU): "Оставайтесь там. Я запрещаю вам приближаться."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pare bem aí. Eu o proíbo de se aproximar mais."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「請就此止步。禁止再繼續接近。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「请就此止步。禁止再继续接近。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Fermi dove siete. Vi proibisco di avvicinarvi ulteriormente."

Speaker: Kanon
Steam (ST): "...If you do, ...I'll kill you."
Umineko Project (UP): "......If you do, ......I'll kill you."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……それ以上、近寄れば、……斬るっ。」
Russian (RU): "......Если приблизитесь...... я убью вас."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Se o fizer, ......eu o matarei."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……再接近過來的話，……我會動手的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……再接近过来的话，……我会动手的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Se lo fate... vi ucciderò."

Steam (ST): They could see a single dinghy leaving the fleet and approaching them. They couldn't tell if it was a messenger or the first wave.
Umineko Project (UP): They could see a single dinghy leave the fleet and approach them.{n}They couldn't tell if it was a messenger or the first wave.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They could see a single dinghy leave the fleet and approach them. They couldn't tell if it was a messenger or the first wave.
PC Japanese (JP): 大船団より、一艘の小船が近付いてくるのが見える。使者か、尖兵か、わからない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 大船団より、一艘の小船が近付いてくるのが見える。{n}使者か、尖兵か、わからない。
Russian (RU): Они видели, как одна шлюпка покинула флот и направлялась к ним.{n}Нельзя было сказать, посланник это или же первая волна.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles podiam avistar um solitário bote deixando a frota e se aproximando.{n}Eles não sabiam dizer se era um mensageiro ou a primeira onda de ataque.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 能夠看到從大船隊中，開過來一艘小船。{n}不知道是使者，還是尖兵。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 能够看到从大船队中，开过来一艘小船。{n}不知道是使者，还是尖兵。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Potevano vedere una sola barca a remi che lasciava la flotta e si avvicinava. {n}Non sapevano dire se fosse un messaggero o la prima ondata.

Steam (ST): Shannon and Kanon watched it cautiously...
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon and Kanon watched it cautiously...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Shannon and Kanon watched it cautiously...
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音と嘉音は、用心深く様子を見守る…。
Russian (RU): Шаннон и Канон внимательно наблюдали за ней...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Shannon e Kanon observaram com atenção...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音和嘉音慎重地觀察著…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音和嘉音慎重地观察着…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Shannon e Kanon la guardarono con cautela...

Steam (ST): At the head of that dinghy rowed by goats...stood Erika.
Umineko Project (UP): At the head of that dinghy rowed by goats......stood Erika.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At the head of that dinghy rowed by goats......stood Erika.
PC Japanese (JP): 山羊がオールを漕ぐその小船の先頭には、……ヱリカが堂々と立っていた。
Russian (RU): Во главе шлюпки, на которой гребли козлоголовые...... стояла Эрика.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na proa do bote remado por cabras......estava Erika.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在由山羊划槳的這小船的船頭，……繪梨花堂堂正正地站在那裡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在由山羊划桨的这小船的船头，……绘梨花堂堂正正地站在那里。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A capo della barca piena di caproni... vi era Erika.

Steam (ST): ...Where the heck did she get that thing from? Maybe she's trying to act the part of the fleet's leader. ...Erika was glaring at them and smiling aggressively, with what appeared to be a pirate hat on her head.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Where had she gotten that headgear from? Maybe she was trying to act the part of the fleet's leader. ......The object on top of Erika's head, as she glared at them with an audacious smile, appeared to be a pirate hat.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Where could she have gotten that from? Maybe she's trying to act the part of the fleet's leader. ......Erika was glaring at them and smiling aggressively, with what appeared to be a pirate hat on her head.
PC Japanese (JP): どこから持ってきたやら。この大船団の長を気取っているのだろうか。……海賊帽のようなものを被り、こちらを睨みながら不敵に笑っている。
Russian (RU): ...Откуда у неё это? Может, строит из себя лидера флота. ......Эрика смотрела на них и агрессивно улыбалась с пиратской шляпой на голове.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...De onde ela tirou aquele chapéu? Talvez ela estivesse tentando agir como se fosse a comandante da frota. ......O objeto sobre a cabeça de Erika, conforme ela olhava para eles com um sorriso audacioso, aparentava ser um chapéu pirata.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不知道是從哪裡拿來的。大概是打算體現自己是這大船隊的統領者吧。……她戴著海盜帽般的東西，盯著這邊無畏地笑著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不知道是从哪里拿来的。大概是打算体现自己是这大船队的统领者吧。……她戴着海盗帽般的东西，盯着这边无畏地笑着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Da dove l'aveva presa? Forse sta cercando di fare la parte del capo della flotta. ... Erika li osservava e sorrideva in modo aggressivo, con quello che sembrava essere un cappello da pirata sulla sua testa.

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Steam (ST): "I've come to deliver our terms. There will be room for negotiation. Please open the gate."
Umineko Project (UP): "I've come to deliver our terms. There will be room for negotiation. Please open the gate."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「最後通牒に参りました。交渉余地のあるものです。開門して下さい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「最後通牒に参りました。交渉余地のあるものです。開門して下さい」
Russian (RU): "Я пришла передать наши условия. Будут переговоры. Откройте ворота."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu vim para dar o nosso ultimato. Haverá espaço para negociações. Por favor, abram o portão."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我是來下最後通牒的。還有交涉餘地。請開門。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我是来下最后通牒的。还有交涉余地。请开门。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sono venuta per dare le nostre condizioni. Ci sarà spazio per negoziare. {n}Per favore aprite il cancello."

Steam (ST): Shannon and Kanon looked at each other.
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon and Kanon looked at each other.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音と嘉音は顔を見合わせる。
Russian (RU): Шаннон и Канон переглянулись.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Shannon e Kanon olharam um para o outro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音和嘉音相互對視。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音和嘉音相互对视。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Shannon e Kanon si guardarono.

Steam (ST): Erika was the one offering this deal. It wasn't likely to be anything agreeable.
Umineko Project (UP): Erika was the one offering this deal. It wasn't likely to be anything agreeable.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Erika was the one offering this deal. It wasn't likely to be anything agreeable.
PC Japanese (JP): ヱリカの持ってくるものだ。どうせろくな条件じゃない。
Russian (RU): Эту сделку предлагает Эрика. Вряд ли она будет приемлемой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Erika estava oferecendo um acordo. Era pouco provável que fosse algo agradável.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 既然是繪梨花帶來的。肯定不會是什麼好條件。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 既然是绘梨花带来的。肯定不会是什么好条件。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Erika era colei che offriva questo patto. Probabilmente non era nulla di accettabile.

Steam (ST): However, if they turned her away, the attack would probably begin at once.
Umineko Project (UP): However, if they turned her away, the attack would probably begin at once.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, if they turned her away, the attack would probably begin at once.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、それを門前払いにすれば、ただちに攻撃を開始するだろう。
Russian (RU): Но если они прогонят её, сразу же начнётся атака.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, se eles dessem as costas, o ataque logo poderia ter início.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，把她逐出門前的話，肯定會立刻開始攻擊吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，把她逐出门前的话，肯定会立刻开始攻击吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, se l'avessero mandata via, l'attacco sarebbe probabilmente iniziato subito.

Steam (ST): Since they were in a firmly inferior position, they wanted to buy time by any means they could.
Umineko Project (UP): Since they were in a firmly inferior position, they wanted to buy time by any means they could.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since they were in a firmly inferior position, they wanted to buy time by any means they could.
PC Japanese (JP): 絶対的劣勢であることを考えれば、今はどんな形であっても時間を稼ぎたい。
Russian (RU): В своём крайне невыгодном положении они хотели любыми средствами выиграть время.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por estarem em uma posição firmemente inferior, eles precisavam ganhar tempo a todo custo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 考慮到如今處於絕對劣勢下，現在無論以什麼形式都要拖延時間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 考虑到如今处于绝对劣势下，现在无论以什么形式都要拖延时间。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dato che erano in una posizione decisamente inferiore, volevano prendere del tempo con tutti i mezzi possibili.

Steam (ST): At Shannon's nod, Kanon erased his sword...
Umineko Project (UP): At Shannon's nod, Kanon erased his sword......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At Shannon's nod, Kanon erased his sword......
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音が頷くと、嘉音は剣を消す……。
Russian (RU): Шаннон кивнула, и Канон стёр свой меч......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com o consentimento de Shannon, Kanon apagou sua espada......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音一點頭，嘉音便把劍消去……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音一点头，嘉音便把剑消去……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Al cenno col capo di Shannon, Kanon cancellò la sua spada...

Steam (ST): The Golden Land was filled with a hard downpour accompanied by occasional thunder.
Umineko Project (UP): The Golden Land was filled with a hard downpour accompanied by occasional thunder.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The Golden Land was filled with a hard downpour accompanied by occasional thunder.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金郷は、時折雷鳴を伴う強い雨が降っていた。
Russian (RU): В Золотой Земле шёл сильный ливень, сопровождаемый вспышками грома.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Terra Dourada estava tomada por um forte aguaceiro que caía acompanhado de trovões ocasionais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黃金鄉有時會伴隨著雷鳴降下大雨。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黄金乡有时会伴随着雷鸣降下大雨。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La Terra Dorata era riempita da un leggero acquazzone con qualche tuono occasionale.

Steam (ST): Erika, who realized that this weather spoke for their emotions, smiled even more boldly.
Umineko Project (UP): Realizing that this weather spoke for their emotions, Erika smiled even more boldly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Erika, who realized that this weather spoke for their emotions, smiled even more boldly.
PC Japanese (JP): その天気が、彼らの感情を意味することをヱリカは察し、さらに不敵に笑う。
Russian (RU): Поняв, что такая погода выражает их эмоции, Эрика улыбнулась ещё смелее.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Percebendo que esse tempo falava por suas emoções, Erika sorriu com ainda mais audácia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 察覺到這天氣代表著他們的感情，繪梨花笑得更歡了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 察觉到这天气代表着他们的感情，绘梨花笑得更欢了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Erika, che aveva capito che questo clima parlava per le loro emozioni, sorrise anche più sfacciatamente.

Steam (ST): At the center of the Golden Land...was the arbor surrounded by the golden rose garden.
Umineko Project (UP): At the center of the Golden Land...was the arbor surrounded by the golden rose garden.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At the center of the Golden Land...was the arbor surrounded by the golden rose garden.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金郷は、黄金の薔薇庭園に囲まれた東屋を中心とする。
Russian (RU): В центре Золотой Земли... стояла беседка, окружённая золотым розарием.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No centro da Terra Dourada...estava o gazebo cercado pelo jardim de rosas douradas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 黃金鄉是以被黃金的玫瑰庭園包圍著的東屋為中心的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 黄金乡是以被黄金的玫瑰庭园包围着的东屋为中心的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Al centro della Terra Dorata... vi era il pergolato circondato dal giardino di rose dorate.

Steam (ST): A large number of Humans and Illusions were there, arguing about something.
Umineko Project (UP): A large number of {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}s and fantasy creatures were there, arguing about something.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A large number of humans and fantasy creatures were there, arguing about something.
PC Japanese (JP): 東屋には、ニンゲンも幻想の住人も大勢が集まり、何やら議論をしていた。
Russian (RU): Там о чём‐то спорило множество {y:0:Люд}{n:0:люд}ей и сказочных созданий.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um vasto número de {y:0:Humanos}{n:0:humanos} e criaturas da fantasia estavam ali, discutindo sobre alguma coisa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在東屋裡，人類和幻想的住人們一大群聚在一起，在討論著什麼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在东屋里，人类和幻想的住人们一大群聚在一起，在讨论着什么。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): C'era un grande numero di umani e creature fantastiche lì, che discutevano riguardo a qualcosa.

Steam (ST): Even without asking, it was easy to guess the nature of the debate by their anguished expressions.
Umineko Project (UP): Even without asking, it was easy to guess the nature of the debate by their anguished expressions.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even without asking, it was easy to guess the nature of the debate by their anguished expressions.
PC Japanese (JP): その内容を聞かずとも、彼らの苦々しい表情から、議論の大体の想像が出来る。
Russian (RU): Даже не спрашивая, по их мучительным выражениям было легко предположить характер спора.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo sem perguntar, era fácil adivinhar a natureza do debate apenas julgando suas expressões angustiadas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就算不聽那內容，從他們那苦悶的表情裡，大致就能想像出是在討論什麼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就算不听那内容，从他们那苦闷的表情里，大致就能想象出是在讨论什么。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche senza chiedere, era facile indovinare la natura del dibattito dalle loro espressioni angosciate.

Steam (ST): After all, in this life-or-death situation, they didn't have many options they could take...
Umineko Project (UP): After all, in this life‐or‐death situation, they didn't have many options they could take......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After all, in this life-or-death situation, they didn't have many options they could take......
PC Japanese (JP): この絶体絶命の状況下で、彼らに選び得る選択肢など、決して多くはないのだから……。
Russian (RU): В конце концов, в ситуации вопроса жизни или смерти у них осталось не так уж много вариантов......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Afinal, nessa situação de vida ou morte, eles não tinham muitas opções à disposição......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為在這種窮途末路的情況下，他們能夠選擇的選項，肯定不會多……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为在这种穷途末路的情况下，他们能够选择的选项，肯定不会多……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopotutto, in questa situazione di vita o di morte, non avevano molta scelta...

Steam (ST): In the direction Erika was being led, Beato stood waiting, accompanied by the Chiester Sisters Corps.
Umineko Project (UP): In the direction Erika was being led—with her goat guards alongside her—Beato stood waiting, accompanied by the Chiester Sisters troops.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In the direction Erika was being led, Beato stood waiting, accompanied by the Siesta Sisters Troops.
PC Japanese (JP): ヱリカの行く手には、シエスタ姉妹兵を連れたベアトが待ち構えていた。
Russian (RU): В том направлении, куда вели Эрику, в ожидании стояла Беато, сопровождаемая отрядом Сестёр чиест.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na direção em que Erika estava sendo conduzida — com seus guardas‐cabra acompanhando‐a — Beato estava a seu aguardo, acompanhada pela tropa das Irmãs Chiesters.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪梨花的去路上，帶著謝絲塔姐妹兵的貝阿朵正等在那裡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘梨花的去路上，带着谢丝塔姐妹兵的贝阿朵正等在那里。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nella direzione verso cui Erika veniva guidata, Beato era lì ad aspettare, accompagnata dalle Truppe Sorelle Siesta.

Steam (ST): When Erika, accompanied by her goat guards, saw Beato, she gave a bow that only appeared graceful.
Umineko Project (UP): Noticing Beato, Erika gave a bow that at least {i:appeared} graceful.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When Erika, followed by her goat guards, saw her, she gave a bow that only appeared graceful.
PC Japanese (JP): 山羊の護衛を連れたヱリカもその姿を認め、見た目だけは美しくお辞儀をする。
Russian (RU): Увидев её, Эрика, за которой следовала её козлоголовая охрана, поклонилась, но только {i:на вид} изящно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Percebendo Beato, Erika curvou‐se de forma que, ao menos, {i:aparentou} certa graciosidade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 帶著山羊護衛的繪梨花也確認了那身姿，用看起來很美的姿勢行禮。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 带着山羊护卫的绘梨花也确认了那身姿，用看起来很美的姿势行礼。

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Steam (ST): "...That's a pretty cruel whim to force on someone. How are a few wimpy people in what's basically an already-solved puzzle supposed to fight against our fleet, with its hundreds of thousands of troops?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......That's a pretty cruel whim to force on someone. How are a few wimpy people like you, the dregs of an already‐solved puzzle, supposed to fight against our fleet, with its hundreds of thousands of troops?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......That's a pretty cruel whim to force on someone. How are a few wimpy people in what's basically an already-solved puzzle supposed to fight against our fleet, with its hundreds of thousands of troops?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……それは酷いわがままですね。十万の兵力を擁する我が艦隊に、すでに解き終えたパズルみたいな、絞りカスのあんたたちがほんの数十人で、どう抵抗をさせようというのです？」
Russian (RU): "......Принуждать к такому — жестокая прихоть. Как нескольким слабым людям — в том, что уже практически разгаданная головоломка — противостоять нашему флоту с его сотнями тысяч войск?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Esse é um capricho bem cruel de se forçar em outrem. Como alguns fracos como vocês, os resíduos de um enigma já resolvido, pretendem lutar contra a nossa frota, que detém de milhares de soldados?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……這還真是相當的任性啊。擁有十萬兵力的我的艦隊，以你們這數十個像已經被解開的謎題一般的殘渣，要如何抵抗得了呢？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……这还真是相当的任性啊。拥有十万兵力的我的舰队，以你们这数十个像已经被解开的谜题一般的残渣，要如何抵抗得了呢？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... È un capriccio piuttosto crudele da forzare su qualcuno. Come potrebbero poche deboli persone in un enigma praticamente già risolto combattere contro la nostra flotta, con centinaia di migliaia di soldati?"

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "Very true, very true... The gap in strength is overwhelming. We told her that it wouldn't even be a fight, but... Well, ...Lady {f:5:Lambdadelta} didn't listen, and just said she would bring some of her friends to support us, so we should fight with everything we had."
Umineko Project (UP): "Very true, very true... The gap in strength is overwhelming. We told her that it wouldn't even be a fight, but...... Well, ......Lady {f:5:Lambdadelta} didn't listen, and just said she would bring some of her friends to support us, so we should fight with everything we had."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Very true, very true... The gap in strength is overwhelming. We told her that it wouldn't even be a fight, but...... Well, ......Lady Lambdadelta didn't listen, and just said she would bring some of her friends to support us, so we should fight with everything we had."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうなのだ、そうなのだ…。戦力差は圧倒的。戦いにさえならぬと我らは言っておるのだがな……。その、……ラムダデルタ卿が、彼女の友人たちを集めて共闘するから、徹底抗戦せよと言って聞かぬのだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうなのだ、そうなのだ…。戦力差は圧倒的。戦いにさえならぬと我らは言っておるのだがな……。その、……ラムダデルタ卿が、彼女の友人たちを集めて共闘するから、徹底抗戦せよと言って聞かぬのだ」
Russian (RU): "Именно, именно... Разрыв в силе ошеломляет. Мы сказали ей, что это будет даже не битва, но...... Ну...... леди {f:5:Лямбдадельта} не стала слушать и просто сказала нам выложиться на полную, говоря, что приведёт своих друзей, чтобы поддержать нас."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, pois é... A diferença na força é avassaladora. Nós dissemos a ela que sequer seria uma luta, mas...... Bem, ......a Lady {f:5:Lambdadelta} não deu ouvidos, e apenas disse que ela traria alguns de seus amigos para nos apoiar, por isso deveríamos lutar com tudo que estivesse à disposição."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「就是的就是的…。戰力差完全是壓倒性的。吾等也說了，這連戰爭都算不上啊……。但是那個，……拉姆達戴露塔卿她說會叫她的朋友們一起來打的，讓吾等抗戰到底，完全不聽啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「就是的就是的…。战力差完全是压倒性的。吾等也说了，这连战争都算不上啊……。但是那个，……拉姆达戴露塔卿她说会叫她的朋友们一起来打的，让吾等抗战到底，完全不听啊。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Vero, vero... la differenza di potenza è schiacciante. Le abbiamo detto che non sarebbe stata neanche una battaglia, ma... beh... Lady Lambdadelta non ha ascoltato, e ha solo detto che avrebbe portato alcuni dei suoi amici ad aiutarci, così che potessimo lottare con tutto quello che avevamo."

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Steam (ST): "...Lady {f:5:Lambdadelta}'s...friends...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......Lady {f:5:Lambdadelta}'s.........friends......?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Lady Lambdadelta's...... ......friends......?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……ラムダデルタ卿の、………ご友人……？」
Russian (RU): "......Леди {f:5:Лямбдадельта}......приведёт своих друзей?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Amigos da.........Lady {f:5:Lambdadelta}......?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……拉姆達戴露塔卿的，………朋友們……？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……拉姆达戴露塔卿的，………朋友们……？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Gli amici... di Lady Lambdadelta...?"

Steam (ST): Unlike {f:5:Bernkastel}, who kept to herself, {f:5:Lambdadelta} had many friends.
Umineko Project (UP): Unlike {f:5:Bernkastel}, who kept to herself, {f:5:Lambdadelta} had many friends.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Unlike Bernkastel, who kept to herself, Lambdadelta had many friends.
PC Japanese (JP): 孤高の魔女ベルンカステルと違い、ラムダデルタは友人が多い。
Russian (RU): В отличие от {f:5:Бернкастель}, которая была сама по себе, у {f:5:Лямбдадельты} было много друзей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Diferente de {f:5:Bernkastel}, que se mantém sozinha, {f:5:Lambdadelta} tinha muitos amigos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與孤高的魔女貝倫卡斯泰露不同，拉姆達戴露塔的朋友很多。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与孤高的魔女贝伦卡斯泰露不同，拉姆达戴露塔的朋友很多。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A differenza di Bernkastel, che era solitaria, Lambdadelta aveva molti amici.

Steam (ST): Her friends and patrons were either territory lords of great influence who came from all over the place...or else monsters that had become legends in their own lifetimes.
Umineko Project (UP): Her friends and patrons were all formidable, including monsters that had become legends in their own lifetimes and territory lords commanding vast influence over their respective domains.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Her friends and patrons were either territory lords of great influence that came from all over the place, or else monsters that had become legends in their own lifetimes.
PC Japanese (JP): その友人やパトロンたちは、いずれも各地に絶大な勢力を誇る領主たちや、生きたまま伝説に至ったようなバケモノばかり。
Russian (RU): Её друзья и покровители были либо влиятельными территориальными лордами отовсюду, либо чудовищами, ставшими легендами в свои времена.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Seus amigos e clientes eram todos formidáveis, incluindo monstros que se tornaram lendas durante suas vidas e Lordes territoriais comandando vasta influência sobre seus respectivos domínios.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她的朋友和後援者們，每一個都是在各地擁有巨大勢力的領主，還有活著時就成為了傳說的怪物們。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她的朋友和后援者们，每一个都是在各地拥有巨大势力的领主，还有活着时就成为了传说的怪物们。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I suoi amici e patroni erano padroni di territori di grande influenza che venivano da dovunque, oppure mostri che sono diventati leggenda nell'arco della loro vita.

Steam (ST): In all seriousness, her so-called "fan club" had enough size and influence that it could have suddenly declared itself a separate country in the sea of Fragments without anyone being overly surprised.
Umineko Project (UP): In all seriousness, her "fan club", as she so called it, had enough size and influence that no one would have been overly surprised if it had suddenly declared itself an independent nation right in the middle of the sea of fragments.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In all seriousness, her so-called 'fan club' had enough size and influence that it could have suddenly declared itself a separate country in the sea of Fragments without anyone being overly surprised.
PC Japanese (JP): 冗談抜きで、彼女の自称ファンクラブは、カケラの海のど真ん中に唐突に独立国家を宣言しても何の不思議もないほどの勢力がある。
Russian (RU): Со всей серьёзностью, её так называемый «фан‐клуб» был достаточно обширен и влиятелен, чтобы никто особо не удивился, если бы он вдруг объявил себя отдельной страной в море фрагментов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com toda a seriedade, seu "fã club", assim como ela chama, tinha tamanho e influência o suficiente para que ninguém ficasse surpreso se, de repente, o mesmo se declarasse uma nação independente no meio do mar de Fragmentos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不開玩笑，她的粉絲組成的俱樂部（自稱），都有著在碎片之海的正中唐突宣言成立獨立國家也不會奇怪的極大勢力。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不开玩笑，她的粉丝组成的俱乐部（自称），都有着在碎片之海的正中唐突宣言成立独立国家也不会奇怪的极大势力。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Senza scherzi, il suo cosiddetto ‘fan club’ aveva abbastanza grandezza e influenza che avrebbe potuto improvvisamente dichiararsi uno stato a parte nel mare di Frammenti senza che nessuno ne fosse troppo sorpreso.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...This is quite a problem for us, with Lady {f:5:Lambdadelta} all ready for action. Without any regard for us, she keeps calling up friends and acquaintances on the phone from all over the place, telling them to come over..."
Umineko Project (UP): "......To our dismay, Lady {f:5:Lambdadelta} is very much ready for action. Without any regard for us, she keeps calling up friends and acquaintances on the phone from all over the place, telling them to come over..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......This is quite a problem for us, with Lady Lambdadelta all ready for action. Without any regard for us, she keeps calling up friends and acquaintances on the phone from all over the place, telling them to come over..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……困ったことに、ラムダデルタ卿はやる気満々でな。さっきから勝手に各地に電話を繰り返し、友人知人を呼びつけておるのだ…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……困ったことに、ラムダデルタ卿はやる気満々でな。さっきから勝手に各地に電話を繰り返し、友人知人を呼びつけておるのだ…」
Russian (RU): "......Леди {f:5:Лямбдадельта}, готовая действовать, усложняет дело. Не обращая на нас никакого внимания, она продолжает обзванивать своих друзей и знакомых отовсюду, говоря им приехать..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Para o nosso desânimo, a Lady {f:5:Lambdadelta} está mais do que pronta para a ação. Sem qualquer consideração por nós, ela continua chamando amigos e conhecidos pelo telefone, de todos os lugares possíveis, dizendo‐os para virem..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……更困擾的是，拉姆達戴露塔卿還是幹勁滿滿的。剛才就擅自地往各個地方打電話，要把朋友和熟人給叫過來……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……更困扰的是，拉姆达戴露塔卿还是干劲满满的。刚才就擅自地往各个地方打电话，要把朋友和熟人给叫过来……」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Questo è proprio un problema per noi, con Lady Lambdadelta pronta all'azione. Senza alcun riguardo per noi, continua a chiamare al telefono amici e conoscenti da dovunque, dicendo loro di venire..."

Steam (ST): ...Of course, this was all a lie.
Umineko Project (UP): .........Of course, this was all a lie.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Of course, this was all a lie.
PC Japanese (JP): ………もちろん、全部ウソだ。
Russian (RU): ......Разумеется, всё это ложь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Obviamente, isso era mentira.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………當然，全都是謊言。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………当然，全都是谎言。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ovviamente, questa era tutta una menzogna.

Steam (ST): {f:5:Lambdadelta} had turned into a small candy comet and was now shooting towards the City of Books, with Battler and Ange in tow.
Umineko Project (UP): {f:5:Lambdadelta} had turned into a small candy comet and was now shooting towards the City of Books with Battler and Ange in tow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Lambdadelta had turned into a small candy comet and was now shooting towards the City of Books, with Battler and Ange in tow.
PC Japanese (JP): ラムダデルタは、戦人と縁寿を連れ、小さな金平糖の流れ星に姿を変え、今頃、図書の都に向かっている。
Russian (RU): {f:5:Лямбдадельта} превратилась в конфетную комету и сейчас летит с Баттлером и Энджи к Книжному городу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {f:5:Lambdadelta} havia se transformado em um pequeno konpeitou e agora estava dirigindo‐se à Capital dos Livros junto com Battler e Ange.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 拉姆達戴露塔帶著戰人和緣壽，變成小金平糖的流星般的樣子，現在正在趕赴圖書之都。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 拉姆达戴露塔带着战人和缘寿，变成小金平糖的流星般的样子，现在正在赶赴图书之都。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lambdadelta si era trasformata in una piccola cometa di caramelle e si stava scagliando verso la Città dei Libri, dando un passaggio a Battler e Ange.

Steam (ST): So, to make sure that {f:5:Lambdadelta}'s and Battler's absences were not noticed, everyone was crowded around the arbor, pretending to argue furiously with each other...
Umineko Project (UP): So, to make sure that {f:5:Lambdadelta}'s and Battler's absences were not noticed, everyone was crowded around the arbor, pretending to argue furiously with each other...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So, to make sure that Lambdadelta's and Battler's absences were not noticed, everyone was crowded around the arbor, pretending to argue furiously with each other...
PC Japanese (JP): だから、ラムダデルタや戦人の不在を気取られないように、ああして東屋に全員がぞろりと集まって、喧々諤々と議論をしているフリをしているのだ…。
Russian (RU): Поэтому, чтобы отсутствие {f:5:Лямбдадельты} и Баттлера осталось незамеченным, все столпились вокруг беседки, делая вид, что яростно спорят друг с другом...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, para ter certeza que a ausência de {f:5:Lambdadelta} e Battler não fosse percebida, todos estavam reunidos no gazebo, fingindo que estavam discutindo furiosamente uns com os outros...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，為了拉姆達戴露塔和戰人不在之事不被察覺到，所有人都聚集在東屋，假裝進行著吵吵嚷嚷的爭論…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，为了拉姆达戴露塔和战人不在之事不被察觉到，所有人都聚集在东屋，假装进行着吵吵嚷嚷的争论…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi, per assicurarsi che le assenze di Lambdadelta e di Battler non fossero notate, tutti erano affollati intorno al pergolato, fingendo di discutere furiosamente tra di loro...

Speaker: Lucifer
Steam (ST): "Battler-sama, give us your decision!! We, the Seven Sisters of Purgatory, are prepared for death at any time!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Battler‐sama, give us your decision!! We, the Seven Sisters of Purgatory, are prepared for death at any time!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Battler-sama, give us your decision!! We, the Seven Sisters of Purgatory, are prepared for death at any time!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「戦人さまっ、ご決断を！！　我ら煉獄の七姉妹ッ、いつでも死ぬ覚悟は出来ております！！」
Russian (RU): "Господин Баттлер, скажите нам своё решение! Мы, Семь сестёр чистилища, готовы умереть в любой момент!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Battler‐sama, diga‐nos sua decisão!! Nós, as Sete Irmãs do Purgatório, estamos preparadas para a morte!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「戰人少爺，請下決定！！我們煉獄七姐妹，隨時都做好了死的覺悟！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「战人少爷，请下决定！！我们炼狱七姐妹，随时都做好了死的觉悟！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Battler-sama, ci dia la sua decisione!! Noi, le Sette Sorelle del Purgatorio, siamo pronte alla morte in qualunque momento!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "I firmly oppose taking a last stand that would lead to our deaths! What could possibly be gained by dying?"
Umineko Project (UP): "I firmly oppose taking a last stand that would lead to our deaths! What could possibly be gained by dying?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「玉砕には反対だ！　死んで咲く果実などありはせんよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「玉砕には反対だ！　死んで咲く果実などありはせんよ」
Russian (RU): "Я решительно против принятия последнего боя, который нас погубит! Что мы приобретём, умерев?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu sou completamente oposto a uma última defensiva que nos levará à morte! O que ganharíamos morrendo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「反對拼個玉碎！死了就什麼都沒有了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「反对拼个玉碎！死了就什么都没有了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Io mi oppongo fermamente a una resistenza che ci porterebbe alla morte! {n}Cosa si potrebbe ottenere morendo?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "How can you be such a coward?! It is inconceivable that we should live on in shame as prisoners!"
Umineko Project (UP): "How can you be such a coward?! It is inconceivable that we should live on in shame as prisoners!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「あなたは腰抜けです！　生きて虜囚の辱めを受けるなど、考えられませんッ！」
Russian (RU): "Как ты можешь быть таким трусом?! Немыслимо, чтобы мы жили в позоре, как пленники!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Como pode ser tão covarde?! É inconcebível que nós vivamos nossas vidas na vergonha de sermos prisioneiros!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「親愛的你太沒志氣了！活著受到俘虜般的屈辱，簡直無法想像！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「亲爱的你太没志气了！活着受到俘虏般的屈辱，简直无法想象！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Come puoi essere un tale codardo?! È inconcepibile che dovremmo vivere nella vergogna come prigionieri!"

Speaker: {f:5:Virgilia}
Steam (ST): "There are times when the mere fact of being alive gives one opportunities."
Umineko Project (UP): "There are times when the mere fact of being alive gives one opportunities."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「生きてこそ、チャンスを待てることもあります。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「生きてこそ、チャンスを待てることもあります」
Russian (RU): "Порой возможности появляются просто потому, что живёшь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Há vezes em que o simples fato de estar vivo o dá oportunidades."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「正因為活著，才能夠等待機會。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「正因为活着，才能够等待机会。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ci sono momenti in cui il solo fatto di essere vivi da delle opportunità."

Steam (ST): "...Yes, indeed. A short temper makes a bad leader..."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Yes, indeed. A short temper makes a bad leader..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そうですとも。短気は損気とも申します…」
Russian (RU): "......Действительно. Вспыльчивый лидер не может быть хорошим..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Sim, realmente. Um pavio curto o torna um péssimo líder..."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……就是这样。心急吃不上热豆腐呀……」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Battler, if you call yourself a man, now's the time to act like one! The Great {f:5:Lambdadelta}-sama is even willing to help out, right?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Battler, if you call yourself a man, now's the time to act like one! The great {f:5:Lambdadelta}‐sama is even willing to help out, right?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Battler, if you call yourself a man, now's the time to act like one! The Great Lambdadelta-sama is even willing to help out, right?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「戦人っ、男ならバシッと決めろぃ！　大ラムダデルタさまが力を貸してくれるってんだろ？！」
Russian (RU): "Баттлер, если называешь себя мужчиной, самое время действовать как мужчина! Великая госпожа {f:5:Лямбдадельта} даже готова помочь, верно?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Battler, se você se diz homem, então está na hora de agir como um! A Grande {f:5:Lambdadelta}‐sama ainda está disposta a ajudar, certo?!"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os três andaram na direção da escuridão da profunda trincheira oceânica que era a Capital dos Livros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 3 人向著圖書之都的，大海溝的黑暗游去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 3 人向着图书之都的，大海沟的黑暗游去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Loro tre nuotarono nell'oscurità della profonda fossa oceanica che era la Città dei Libri.

Steam (ST): In that massive, vast trench of bookshelves, they vanished into the darkness almost immediately.
Umineko Project (UP): In that massive, vast trench of bookshelves, they vanished into the darkness almost immediately.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In that massive, vast trench of bookshelves, they vanished into the darkness almost immediately.
PC Japanese (JP): その姿は、あまりに広大で巨大な本棚の海溝の闇に、すぐに溶け込んで消える。
Russian (RU): В этой огромной, обширной траншее книжных полок они почти сразу же канули во мрак.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nesse imensa e vasta trincheira de estantes, eles desapareceram na escuridão quase que imediatamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在過於廣大的巨大書架的海溝之間的黑暗中，他們的身影很快溶進去消失了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在过于广大的巨大书架的海沟之间的黑暗中，他们的身影很快溶进去消失了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quell'enorme, vasta fossa di scaffali, svanirono nell'oscurità quasi immediatamente.

Steam (ST): The library defied the common sense of the human world. ...The City of Books.
Umineko Project (UP): The library defied the common sense of the human world.......The City of Books.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The library defied the common sense of the human world.......The City of Books.
PC Japanese (JP): 人の世の常識を超えた、広大な図書館。……図書の都。
Russian (RU): Библиотека бросала вызов здравому смыслу мира людей. ......Книжный город.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A biblioteca desafiava o senso comum do mundo humano. ......A Capital dos Livros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 超越了人世間常識的，廣大的圖書館。……圖書之都。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 超越了人世间常识的，广大的图书馆。……图书之都。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La biblioteca sfidava il buonsenso del mondo umano. ... La Città dei Libri.

Steam (ST): The word "city" was no exaggeration.
Umineko Project (UP): The word "city" was no exaggeration.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The word 'city' was no exaggeration.
PC Japanese (JP): その広大さは、まさに都の名を偽らない。
Russian (RU): Слово «город» не было преувеличением.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A palavra "capital" não era um exagero.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那份廣大，足以稱得上是都市。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那份广大，足以称得上是都市。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La parola'città' non era un'esagerazione.

Steam (ST): And, it was filled with the green, glowing eyes of {f:5:Bernkastel}'s countless cat familiars.
Umineko Project (UP): And, it was filled with the green, glowing eyes of {f:5:Bernkastel}'s countless cat familiars.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And, it was filled with the green, glowing eyes of Bernkastel's countless cat familiars.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、無数のベルカステルの使い魔の黒猫たちが、そのエメラルドグリーンの瞳を光らせている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そして、無数のベルンカステルの使い魔の黒猫たちが、そのエメラルドグリーンの瞳を光らせている。
Russian (RU): И в нём повсюду были зелёные, горящие глаза бесчисленных кошачьих приспешников {f:5:Бернкастель}.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E ela estava repleta dos olhos verdes dos incontáveis familiares de {f:5:Bernkastel}.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，有無數的貝倫卡斯泰露的使魔黑貓們，瞳孔中閃著祖母綠色的光芒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，有无数的贝伦卡斯泰露的使魔黑猫们，瞳孔中闪着祖母绿色的光芒。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E, era riempita con i verdi, brillanti occhi degli infiniti famigli gatti di Bernkastel.

Steam (ST): Trying to count them would be almost as crazy as counting all the fish in the ocean.
Umineko Project (UP): Trying to count them would be almost as crazy as counting all the fish in the ocean.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Trying to count them would be almost as crazy as counting all the fish in the ocean.
PC Japanese (JP): その数を数えることは、海に住まう魚の数を数えるのと、どちらが早いかわからない。
Russian (RU): Считать их было почти так же безумно, как считать всех рыб в океане.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tentar contá‐los seria tão insano quanto tentar contar todos os peixes do mar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 數它們的數量，和數在海裡居住的魚兒的數量，不知道哪個會更快。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 数它们的数量，和数在海里居住的鱼儿的数量，不知道哪个会更快。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Provare a contarli sarebbe folle come contare tutti i pesci nell'oceano.

Steam (ST): They formed schools that swam all over the place, ...on the lookout for any fools who might miraculously have managed to slip in and disturb their master's party.
Umineko Project (UP): They formed schools that swam all over the place, ......on the lookout for any fools who might miraculously have managed to slip in and disturb their master's party.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They formed schools that swam all over the place, ......on the lookout for any fools who might miraculously have managed to slip in and disturb their master's party.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてそれらは魚群をなし、其処彼処を回遊し、……彼らの主の催しを邪魔しようという愚か者が、奇跡的に紛れ込むことを想定し、警戒している。
Russian (RU): Они образовали стаи, плывущие повсюду...... в поисках дураков, которые могут чудом проскочить и помешать вечеринке их госпожи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles formavam cardumes e nadavam por todo o lugar, ......na busca por tolos que milagrosamente poderiam ter se infiltrado e perturbado a festa de sua mestra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而且這些並不像魚群一樣只是到處游動，……而是想定了會有想要打擾它們的主人舉行的宴會的愚蠢之人奇跡般地混進來，並予以警戒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而且这些并不像鱼群一样只是到处游动，……而是想定了会有想要打扰它们的主人举行的宴会的愚蠢之人奇迹般地混进来，并予以警戒。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Formavano banchi che si muovevano ovunque... in cerca di qualche sciocco che sarebbe miracolosamente riuscito a imbucarsi e disturbare la festa della loro padrona.

Steam (ST): If Battler's group was found, the cats would report it instantly. They would probably form a pack, open their large mouths and swallow them in a single gulp.
Umineko Project (UP): If Battler's group was found, the cats would report it instantly.{n}They would probably form a pack, open their large mouths and swallow them in a single gulp.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If Battler's group was found, the cats would report it instantly. They would probably form a pack, open their large mouths and swallow them in a single gulp.
PC Japanese (JP): 見つかれば、猫たちは瞬時にそれを知らせる。群が集い、大きな顎を開いて、一口に飲み込むだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 見つかれば、猫たちは瞬時にそれを知らせる。{n}群が集い、大きな顎を開いて、一口に飲み込むだろう。
Russian (RU): Если группу Баттлера найдут, кошки мгновенно об этом доложат.{n}Они сгруппируются, раскроют свои большие рты и проглотят их одним махом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se o grupo de Battler fosse encontrado, os gatos iriam reportá‐los imediatamente.{n}Eles provavelmente se aglomerariam, abririam suas grandes bocas e os engoliriam sem nem mastigar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被發現的話，貓咪們會瞬間互相告知。{n}群聚起來，張開大口，一口吞下的吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被发现的话，猫咪们会瞬间互相告知。{n}群聚起来，张开大口，一口吞下的吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se il gruppo di Battler venisse trovato, i gatti lo riferirebbero subito. Probabilmente formerebbero un branco, aprirebbero le loro grandi bocche ingoiandoli in un solo boccone.

Steam (ST): ...There would be no fight.
Umineko Project (UP): ......There would be no fight.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……戦いなど存在しない。
Russian (RU): ......Битвы не будет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Não haveria luta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……根本不存在什麼戰鬥。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……根本不存在什么战斗。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non ci sarebbe battaglia.

Steam (ST): In this place, Battler's party would be swallowed like tiny fishes if they were discovered.
Umineko Project (UP): In this place, Battler's party would be swallowed like tiny fishes if they were discovered.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In this place, Battler's party would be swallowed like tiny fishes if they were discovered.
PC Japanese (JP): ここでの自分たちは、見つかれば飲み込まれる、小魚以下の存在なのだ。
Russian (RU): В этом месте Баттлера и остальных проглотят как крошечных рыб, если обнаружат.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Neste lugar, o grupo de Battler seria engolido como peixinhos caso fossem descobertos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在這裡自己是，被發現的話就會被吞掉的，連小魚都不如的存在。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这里自己是，被发现的话就会被吞掉的，连小鱼都不如的存在。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In questo posto, il gruppo di Battler sarebbe stato ingoiato come minuscoli pesci, se fossero stati scoperti.

Steam (ST): The warships surrounding the Golden Land were well more than a hundred strong.
Umineko Project (UP): The warships surrounding the Golden Land were well more than a hundred strong.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The warships surrounding the Golden Land were well more than a hundred strong.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金郷を包囲する艦艇の数は、百を超えるのは間違いない。
Russian (RU): Золотую Землю окружило более ста военных кораблей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os navios de guerra circundando a Terra Dourada eram cem vezes mais poderosos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 包圍著黃金鄉的艦艇的數量，肯定超過了百艘。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 包围着黄金乡的舰艇的数量，肯定超过了百艘。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le navi da guerra che circondavano la Terra Dorata, erano senza dubbio molto potenti.

Steam (ST): Each of them had dozens of cannons pointing at the door to the Golden Land.
Umineko Project (UP): Each of them had dozens of cannons pointing at the door to the Golden Land.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Each of them had dozens of cannons pointing at the door to the Golden Land.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてそれらがそれぞれ数十もの砲門を突き出し、黄金郷の扉を睨みつけている。
Russian (RU): У каждого были десятки пушек, направленных на дверь в Золотую Землю.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Cada um deles tinha dezenas de canhões apontando para a porta da Terra Dourada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 並且它們各自都伸出數十個炮筒，對準了黃金鄉的門。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 并且它们各自都伸出数十个炮筒，对准了黄金乡的门。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ognuna di loro aveva dozzine di cannoni puntati verso la Terra Dorata.

Steam (ST): The goats that packed the decks of the ships numbered in the tens of thousands.
Umineko Project (UP): The goats that packed the decks of the ships numbered in the tens of thousands.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The goats that packed the decks of the ships numbered in the tens of thousands.
PC Japanese (JP): 船上には、ぎっしりと満載された山羊の兵力が、十万。
Russian (RU): Козлорогие, забившие палубы кораблей, исчислялись десятками тысяч.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As cabras que se amontoavam nos conveses dos navios passavam das dezenas de milhares.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在船上，滿載的山羊的兵力有，十萬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在船上，满载的山羊的兵力有，十万。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I caproni che affollavano i ponti delle navi superavano le decine di migliaia.

Steam (ST): Each one of them carried enough anti-magic toxin in their fangs to completely deny one of the game board pieces.
Umineko Project (UP): Each one of them carried anti‐magic toxin in their fangs, potent enough to completely deny each of the game board pieces one by one.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Each one of them carried enough anti-magic toxin in their fangs to completely deny one of the game board pieces.
PC Japanese (JP): その個々が、ゲーム盤の駒ひとつひとつを完全に否定する、強力な反魔法の毒を牙に宿す。
Russian (RU): У каждого из них было достаточно отрицающего магию токсина в клыках, чтобы раз и навсегда уничтожить фигуру игровой доски.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Cada uma delas carregava toxinas antimagia em suas presas, potente o bastante para negar completamente cada uma e todas as peças do tabuleiro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 它們每一個都擁有著能完全否定遊戲盤上的各個棋子的，有著強力的反魔法毒素的牙。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 它们每一个都拥有着能完全否定游戏盘上的各个棋子的，有着强力的反魔法毒素的牙。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ognuno di loro aveva con sé abbastanza tossina anti-magia nelle loro zanne per negare completamente uno dei pezzi della scacchiera.

Steam (ST): This time, they would chew apart and eat away everything. ...The crowd of goats unleashed their rotten breath and dangling drool.
Umineko Project (UP): This time, they would chew apart and eat away everything. ......The crowd of goats unleashed their rotten breath and dangling drool.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This time, they would chew apart and eat away everything. ......The crowd of goats unleashed their rotten breath and dangling drool.
PC Japanese (JP): 今度こそ、全てを噛み砕き、食い尽くす。……山羊たちの群から吐き出される、生臭い息と滴る涎。
Russian (RU): На этот раз они прогрызут и пожрут абсолютно всё. ......Толпа козлоголовых высвободила гнилое дыхание и свисающие слюни.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Dessa vez, elas iriam abocanhar e devorar tudo. ......A multidão de cabras desencadeava seus hálitos podres e saliva que escorria.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這次才要全部咬碎食盡。……從山羊群的口中流出，冒著腥臭氣息的口水。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这次才要全部咬碎食尽。……从山羊群的口中流出，冒着腥臭气息的口水。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questa volta, avrebbero masticato e divorato tutto. ... La folla di caproni scatenò il loro respiro marcio e la bava che pendeva.

Steam (ST): At that time, Erika, who wanted to avoid trouble and hoped Beato would be able to convince {f:5:Lambdadelta} to surrender peacefully, was sitting alone, calmly enjoying the tea Ronove had poured for her.
Umineko Project (UP): At that time, Erika, who wanted to avoid trouble and hoped Beato would be able to convince {f:5:Lambdadelta} to surrender peacefully, was sitting alone, calmly enjoying the tea Ronove had poured for her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At that time, Erika, who wanted to avoid trouble and hoped Beato would be able to convince Lambdadelta to surrender peacefully, was sitting alone, calmly enjoying the tea Ronove had poured for her.
PC Japanese (JP): その頃、面倒を避けたいヱリカは、ベアトがラムダデルタを説得して、穏便に降参してくれることを期待し、のんびりとひとり、ロノウェの淹れた紅茶を楽しんでいた。
Russian (RU): В это время Эрика, желающая избежать неприятностей и надеющаяся, что Беато сможет убедить {f:5:Лямбдадельту} мирно сдаться, сидела одна, спокойно наслаждалась чаем, который ей подал Ронове.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nesse momento, Erika, que queria evitar problemas e esperava que Beato fosse capaz de convencer {f:5:Lambdadelta} a se render pacificamente, estava sentada sozinha, calmamente desfrutando do chá que Ronove havia servido a ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這時，想要避免麻煩的繪梨花，期待著貝阿朵能說服拉姆達戴露塔安穩地投降，而一人悠閑地品味著羅諾威泡的紅茶。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这时，想要避免麻烦的绘梨花，期待着贝阿朵能说服拉姆达戴露塔安稳地投降，而一人悠闲地品味着罗诺威泡的红茶。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quel momento, Erika, che voleva evitare i guai e sperava che Beato sarebbe riuscita a convincere Lambdadelta ad arrendersi pacificamente, era seduta da sola, gustandosi con calma il tè che Ronove le aveva versato.

Steam (ST): Of course, even Erika wasn't planning to give them unlimited time. In her mind, she had already decided to allow them three yawns before stepping in.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course, even Erika wasn't planning to give them unlimited time. In her mind, she had already decided to allow them three yawns before stepping in.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Of course, even Erika wasn't planning to give them unlimited time. In her mind, she had already decided to allow them three yawns before stepping in.
PC Japanese (JP): 無論、ヱリカとて無限の時間を与えるつもりはない。３つ欠伸を許したら、それで切り上げようと胸の中で決めていた。
Russian (RU): Естественно, даже Эрика не собиралась давать им неограниченное время. Она уже мысленно решила подождать, пока три раза зевнёт, а потом вмешаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, Erika não planejava dar a eles um tempo ilimitado. Na sua cabeça, ela já tinha decidido permitir a eles três bocejos antes de invadir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當然，繪梨花並不打算給予無限的時間。她早就決定在打過 3 個哈欠之後，就結束等待。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当然，绘梨花并不打算给予无限的时间。她早就决定在打过 3 个哈欠之后，就结束等待。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ovviamente, anche Erika non aveva intenzione di dar loro tempo infinito. {n}Nella sua mente, aveva già deciso di concedergli tre sbadigli prima di intervenire.

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Steam (ST): "...This actually isn't so bad. ...Getting to watch Beato try and convince everyone as they call her a coward and a loser."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........This actually isn't so bad. ......Getting to watch Beato try and convince everyone as they call her a coward and a loser."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......This actually isn't so bad. ......Getting to watch Beato try and convince everyone as they call her a coward and a loser."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………意外に悪くないものですね。……あのベアトが、敗北主義者と罵られながら、みんなを説得してるのを眺めるのも。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………意外に悪くないものですね。……あのベアトが、敗北主義者と罵られながら、みんなを説得してるのを眺めるのも」
Russian (RU): "......Вообще‐то не так уж и плохо...... наблюдать за тем, как Беато убеждает всех, а они называют её трусихой и неудачницей."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Isso até que não é ruim. ......Ficar assistindo a Beato tentando convencer todo mundo enquanto eles a chamam de covarde e perdedora."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………意外地還不錯呢。……看著那個貝阿朵，被罵成敗北主義者，還在勸說著大家的樣子。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………意外地还不错呢。……看着那个贝阿朵，被骂成败北主义者，还在劝说着大家的样子。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... In realtà non è così male. ... Riuscire a guardare Beato provare a convincere tutti mentre la chiamano codarda e perdente."

Speaker: Ronove
Steam (ST): "Indeed, it is impressive that our short-tempered mistress has managed to become such an adult. ...Pu ku ku ku."
Umineko Project (UP): "Indeed, it is impressive that our short‐tempered mistress has managed to become such an adult. ......Pu ku ku ku."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Indeed, it is impressive that our short-tempered mistress has managed to become such an adult. ......Pu ku ku ku."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あの短気だったお嬢様が、よくぞここまで大人になられたものです。……ぷっくっくっく。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あの短気だったお嬢様が、よくぞここまで大人になられたものです。……ぷっくっくっく」
Russian (RU): "Да, впечатляет, что наша вспыльчивая госпожа сумела стать такой взрослой. ......Пу‐ку‐ку‐ку."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Realmente, é impressionante que a nossa senhorita de temperamento curto foi capaz de se tornar adulta. ......Pu ku ku ku."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那個易怒的大小姐，總算也已經成長為這樣的大人了。……噗呵呵呵。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那个易怒的大小姐，总算也已经成长为这样的大人了。……噗呵呵呵。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Già, è notevole che la nostra irascibile padrona sia potuta diventare così adulta. ... Pu ku ku ku."

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Steam (ST): "...What's so funny?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......What's so funny?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……何が可笑しいの？」
Russian (RU): "......Что смешного?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Qual a graça?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……有什麼可笑的？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……有什么可笑的？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Cosa c'è di così buffo?"

Steam (ST): The mound of corpses piled up, and still more goats were shot down as they tried to cross it, ...so that, in a few seconds, it really was tall enough to be a tsunami.
Umineko Project (UP): The mound of corpses piled up, and still more goats were shot down as they tried to cross it, ......so that before long, it really was tall enough to be a tsunami.

Russian (RU): Складывался холм трупов, и ещё больше козлоголовых было подстрелено, когда они попытались пересечь этот холм, ......и за несколько секунд он и вправду стал достаточно высок, чтобы быть цунами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A colina de cadáveres se empilhou, e ainda haviam mais cabras a derrubando enquanto buscavam atravessá‐la, ......fazendo com que em pouco tempo, ficasse alta o bastante para ser uma tsunami.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在屍體上再次蓋上屍體，並且因為不斷地在打倒要跨越屍體之山的山羊們，……看著看著，就已經有了真的像海嘯襲來一般的高度。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在尸体上再次盖上尸体，并且因为不断地在打倒要跨越尸体之山的山羊们，……看着看着，就已经有了真的像海啸袭来一般的高度。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il mucchio di corpi si impilò, e, mentre cercavano di superarlo, ancora più caproni venivano abbattuti... così che, in pochi secondi, fu veramente tanto alta da assomigliare ad uno tsunami.

Steam (ST): Beato lifted her hands, telling the pair of battle towers that had been hidden deep in the ground that the day of glory had come again.

PC Japanese (JP): 「我こそは真実の魔女ッ、古戸ヱリカなり！！　今こそ真実にて黄金郷を解体する！！　土は土に。幻は幻に！！　終わらせてあげますよッ、あんたたちの白昼夢！　さぁさ思い出して御覧なさい亡霊たちッ、本当はもうとっくに、死んでるんだってことぉおおおおおおおぉおおお！！」
Russian (RU): "Я — Фурудо {f:5:Эрика}, ведьма правды! На этом правда разберёт Золотую Землю! Пыль к пыли, иллюзии к иллюзиям! Я положу конец вашим грёзам! Ну же, вспомните, призраки! Вспомните, как вы умерли давным‐давно‐о‐о‐о‐о‐о!!!"
